idea:

We are building precision agriculture robots for small farms.
name: Drishti Works LLP

idea:
Solar-Clay Cold Water Purifier


SSS's idea is to provide pure cold drinking water to everyone through Solar energy and clay made storage.


Technic:

Our idea is to install a cold  Solar-Clay water purifier at rural and semi-urban areas where water can be easily drawn from the ground.

A solar water pump will draw water from the ground which will be stored in clay made storage. This water will be further purified by a water purifier and can be accessed by anyone through a vending machine at a minimal cost starting from Re.1/-


Benefits:

1) Low cost

2) Easy access to everyone

3) Depends 100% on renewable energy

4) Pure water from clay storage which is completely chemical-free and helps to boost the metabolism naturally.

5) Natural cold-water which will eliminate the use of  a fridge

6) No water wastage


Challenges of currently used Hand water pump:

1) Impure water which contains impurities and sediments which is not good for health and is not consumable

2) High wastage of water

3) Needs to be operated manually

4) Not easily accessible


This idea is encouraged by the Prime Minister's scheme of Jal Shakti Abhiyan to save, purify and provide drinking water to the common man who is deprived of water.


This will be India's first Solar- Clay Cold Water Purifier which will work on renewable energy and make use of traditional clay water storage by eliminating plastic bottles.
name: amit Singh

idea:
Zinger.AI aims to assist businesses in enhancing their customer’s digital experience.We are leveraging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence & cloud to create products which result in tangible outcomes such as high availability, lower operational costs and maximizing revenues for businesses ranging from small & medium enterprises to Multi national corporations. Zinger.AI aims to disrupt the contact center solutions & enterprise voice market by providing cloud based, multi tenant, pay per use model of services & products which are hitherto not available to businesses to achieve higher level of customer experience.

Products: 

Zinger Virtual Agent, a Cloud based, multi tenanted, self service & usage based Conversational AI Service. Integrate with your existing cloud or on-premise IVR/ACD/PBXs of all leading OEMs as well as cloud based products. 


Features: 

Free Flow Conversation using NLP

Multi language 

Voice Biometrics

Usage Based Billing with no commitments

End to End Fully Managed services with Zero maintenance or hosting charges


Zinger 1-800

Zinger 1-800 provides the new age multi channel solution to bring the hitherto unserviced customer journey under your control while reducing the costs. 


Features: 

Enhance your customers’ experience by replacing different Toll Free or DID numbers to one global call button using 1-800. 

Built on Hosted SIP Gateways, Zinger 1-800 provides enterprise grade connectivity for voice & data transfer to your agent in real time. 

Get your customers’ calls delivered to your IVR/ACD/PBX or to Zinger Cloud IVR for self service & further call distribution. 

Integrate with Zinger Virtual Agent to provide a self service channel. 

Deliver a superior experience to your customers by automatically identifying them. 

Save costs by pre-qualifying the caller based on your own selected metrics.
name: ZINGER AI TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To carry on the business as designers, manufacturers, producers, importers, exporters, traders, buyers, sellers, suppliers, indenters, agents, sub-agents, jobbers, brokers, repairers, cleaners or otherwise deal in automobiles, motor car, lorries, van, motor cycles, cycle-cars, motors, scooters, and other vehicles suitable for propulsion on land, sea, or in the air or in any combination thereof and vehicles of all description whether propelled or assisted by means of petrol, spirit, steam, gas, electrical, animals, or other power, engines, chassis, bodies other parts and components, accessories and all machinery, implements, utensils, appliances, apparatuses, lubricants, solutions, enamels and all things capable of being used for, in or in, connection with manufacture, maintenance and working of motors or other vehicles and other things in construction of any track or surface adapted for the use thereof. To carry on the business of garage keepers, showroom owners for motors and vehicles and suppliers of and dealers in petrol, electricity and other motive power for motors and other vehicles.
name: SHREE SWAARASYA AUTOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are renewable energy company initially focusing on solar energy business specially for rural population. We have solar systems made for rural areas which can solve their daily lighting and mobile charging needs without being dependent on electricity. We wish to grow in this sector where we do business by fulfilling basic need (clean electricity). We also wish to work with NGOs which have similar vision. Providing customised off-grid solar solutions is also our interest. If we get opportunity ti do grid-tie solar projects we are open for same without diluting our interest to serve rural population.
name: INTELLISURGE RENEWABLE ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Capgemini SE is a French multinational corporation that provides consulting, technology, professional, and outsourcing services. It is headquartered in Paris, France. Capgemini has over 200,000 employees in over 40 countries, of whom nearly more than 100,000 are in India.
name: Capgemini
